message.name: ERR_GENERAL_END_DATE_FV_EMPTY
message.locale: End date cannot be blank as it is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTRULESLINK_FV_PRODUCTID_EMPTY
message.locale: No product has been select. Please select a product.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTRULESLINK_FV_RULESINFOID_EMPTY
message.locale: No rule set was selected. Please select a rule set.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTRULESLINK_XRV_PERIOD_OVERLAP
message.locale: The period of this rules set overlaps with that of an existing rules set assignment for this product.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTRULESLINK_XRV_PRODUCT_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot add a rule set as this product has been canceled.
You cannot add a rule set as this product has been cancelled.
